Title: Damage Mitigation
Description:
Obstorn has confirmed that Ardgrin, the overseer in charge of my supply line that runs from the Deeps into Dornogal, is the one who tipped off my peacekeepers.

It is therefore also my opinion that Ardgrin is the one who penned this sedition. He must have sent his workers upstairs to post them around the city.

It is imperative that we remove them before these rumors spread further. Tear them down for me.
ObjectivesText: Tear down 8 Seditious Posters in Dornogal.
